dc_title_s: Dataset for: Recoupling the Livestock Nutrient Economy: A Path forward for Water Quality Improvement (2 of 2)
dc_description_s: Optimization methods were used to evaluate the feasibility of transporting manure for spreading on cropland to meet established nutrient requirements and constructing biogas reactors to process excess manure in areas where long-range transport is found to be infeasible. This dataset includes the methods, inputs, and outputs of this research.
dct_isPartOf_sm: Dataset for: Recoupling the Livestock Nutrient Economy: A Path forward for Water Quality Improvement
